name: Racing North Road
description:
Racing North Road is an addictive game for the fans of arcade racing and driving simulations.
driving for travel from beach and mountain and jungle and flat way. each way need to control best speed from 0 to 420 kms.
enjoying view roads ,music ,make money to upgrade your car.

Stunning Visuals and Graphics
-High Quality and Precise Car Models
-Beautiful and User Friendly User Interface
-Multiple Roads in mountain and beach

High Quality Music and Sound Design
-Beautiful Background Music for all Parts of the Game
-High Quality and Professional Sound Design for Cars
-Exciting Environment Sound Design
-Nice Sound FX

Exciting and Smooth Gameplay
-Simple but Exciting and Highly Addictive Gameplay
-Precise and Real-World Car Simulations
- Upgradeable Speed, Acceleration, Handling, Braking options
-Different Game Modes(Career, Daily, Endless, Free Ride,...)
- Online Leaderboard
